item.title: About me
item.description: I am passionate developer, traveler in my free time and a DIY tutorial maker. Currently working at Ubisoft as a software developer in the monitoring team. I develop backend applications with Go, contribute to the packaging and the deployment (CI/CD) but also debugging and test the application in kubernetes and locally. Also, I had many experiences with Airbus in Toulouse, for developing applications to monitor, visualize and alert the airplances in the air.
